Description.Text: The Terme Cristallo Palace has a peaceful location overlooking the Gulf of Naples, a short drive from the centre of Ischia, and just 5 km away from the ferry port. On its rooftop are thermal pools said to have beneficial health properties, as well as a sun terrace, and there is also an indoor pool with a Jacuzzi. At the hotel spa guests can choose from a range of therapeutic treatments, or enjoy the Turkish bath, and there is also a fitness suite for working out. The hotel restaurant comes complete with a covered terrace and lovely sea views, and guests can take advantage of a daily breakfast and local specialities, as well as drinks from the bar.
